personalInfo.name: Purushottam Shah
personalInfo.title: Technical Project Manager
personalInfo.subtitle: MBA | MPM | Delivering Complex Business Solutions
personalInfo.bio: An accomplished Technical Project Manager with over 9 years of professional experience across the information technology, services, and engineering industries. Holding both an MBA and a Master of Project Management (MPM), I specialize in leading high-stakes business transformations, including CRM, ERP, and custom application deployments. My expertise lies in navigating the end-to-end project lifecycle using Agile and Waterfall methodologies, with a particular focus on risk mitigation (RAID management), financial oversight, and resource optimization. I am dedicated to enhancing organizational productivity through the implementation of EOS/GBS principles and streamlined project governance.
